name: 2day/1night tour
price_tiers: Private Double/Twin: $549pp AUD; Share Double: $449pp AUD; Share Single: $449pp AUD; Triple Share: $449pp AUD
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: 2day/1night tour === Phone: +61 428 797 488 Lovingly restored our 63 foot ketch is designed for adventure while also boasting a comfortable saloon and spacious deck area where guests can relax and enjoy the amazing Whitsunday sunsets. Renowned for its amazing aqua blue water, snorkelling and countless tropical beaches, you will discover a world of pure wonder as you stay and play around the Whitsundays. Laze on the famous Whitehaven Beach, snorkel and kayak around fringing reef in the World Heritage Marine Park and find your own piece of paradise. This voyage is a 2 day 1 night Whitsunday cruise taking a maximum of 17 guests. – We try to cater to everyone, however, if you have a disability which limits movement please contact us to discuss your specific requirements as there are some limitations due to the layout of the vessel: stairs are located from the deck to the sleeping quarters and the galley stairs will need to be climbed to access and depart the vessel and a tender (small vessel) is used to access beaches and bays.  Assistance can be provided. the vessel can lean whilst sailing For latest standby rates please call our reservations team 07 4940 2000 Departs from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach Online check in is required the day before to your trip via email link. • Fresh water jacuzzi on board • Meals freshly prepared on board • Linen and bath towel • Wetsuits, snorkelling gear • Marine Park fees Depart Coral Sea Marina and set sail towards Whitsunday Island, enjoying lunch along the way. At Tongue Bay our guide will take you for a bush walk to Hill Inlet Lookout for some photos and then onto the world famous Whitehaven Beach to relax and chill. Once back on board enjoy sunset snacks and beverages on your way to our nights anchorage. Enjoy a BBQ dinner on deck and a photo slideshow of the day’s photos. Wake up to the beauty of the islands, enjoy breakfast on deck then gear up for a snorkel to enjoy the underwater sea life.  After snorkelling, hop on board for some morning tea then jump back in for another snorkel or kayak.  Then its back on board for a BBQ lunch and then set sail back to Airlie Beach. Tea & coffee with freshly baked biscuits Baked quiche served with a quinoa garden salad, fruit platter and condiments prepared by our friendly crew. Tea & coffee served with Lamingtons A selection of oven baked snacks and dipping sauces Tender marinated chicken thigh fillets on the BBQ. Served with a fresh greek garden salad, green beans, mashed potato and garlic bread. A fresh tropical fruit salad served with yoghurt. Warm raisin and wholemeal toast. Served with a variety of condiments, cereals and milk. Tea and coffee. Tea & coffee served with an assortment of biscuits BBQ Hamburgers and sausages with fresh coleslaw and fruit platter. This is a sample menu and may vary depending on season and availability. Gluten free, lactose free or vegan diets incur a surcharge of $10 payable at check in. CHECK IN: Coral Sea Marina, Northern End Phone: +61 7 4940 2000 © Coral Sea Sailing Adventures P/L ABN: 89 132 171 003
